name: Rover Expedition
description:
In this atmospheric space exploration game for the Oculus Rift, you will complete a series of exciting missions in order to help cultivate a planet as it comes to life.

1. Activate the Plate Tectonics - These generate heat necessary to melt any icecaps and establish a temperature necessary for life

2. Activate the Atmosphere Generator - This begins creating clouds and allows the water cycle to be established

3. Begin Planting - While navigating your rover, toss seed grenades to begin cultivating your planet with a variety of plant life.
